DOC.brief_title: Celsius TCS Hyperthermia System PMCF Trial
DOC.detailed_description: During PMCF Trial participate center internal data Celsius TCS Hyperthermia device collect . The participate center obligate report device-related failure Adverse Event ( injury patient ) . The center report together device-internal data allows calculate failure complication rate . It analyze regard kind tumor concomitant treatment ( radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy ) . The outcome group ( with/without failure complication ) analyze regard demographic treatment parameter .
